channel.title: Radix Talk is shutting down
channel.description:
Radix Talk will be shutting down on 23 May 2022.
The forum is currently in Read-Only mode so that the existing content can be archived. I'm hoping to make the content available as static html so that we don't lose all the valuable contributions made by the community.
I'd like to personally thank @Mattia, @Faraz and @Avaunt for being moderators on Radix Talk and for all the contributions they have made. Also thank you to everyone who signed up and participated in the forum.
Stuart

item.title: Radix Talk is shutting down
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
Thanks Mattia. I think some of the image links are still pointing at cdn.radixtalk.com which doesn’t exist anymore and are getting redirected to a generic http page.

I’ve rebuilt the forum to use local files instead of the CDN files and will re-do the forum archiving/mirroring to make sure it uses the correct links.

Stuart

Read full topic

item.title: Radix Talk is shutting down
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Images aren’t working for me, not sure if that’s intended or not:

For example the images here: How do I get Gateway API data into Grafana Cloud - Validators - RadixTalk

Read full topic

item.title: Radix Talk is shutting down
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
I’ve created a static html snapshot of the Radix Talk forum at https://archive.radixtalk.com

Please let me know if you find anything broken or missing before 23 May 2022. I’ll take a final archive snapshot on this date and then point https://radixtalk.com to the static content.

Read full topic
